notes: Does not interrupt the user's channeling spells upon toggling.
Can regenerate up to 75 mana in one minute.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.description: Grants 1.25 mana regeneration and 2 armor to nearby allies. Deactivate to stop affecting non-hero units.
params: Illusions bestow the aura, but do not benefit from the armor.

additionalInformation: Rings of Aquila are fully sharable.
name: Ring of Aquila
trivia: Aquila is the Latin and Romance languages word for "eagle".
Priscilla and Aquila were a first century Christian missionary married couple described in the New Testament.
tips: When the Aquila Aura is on, allied creeps gain an armor, which is useful if you want to push the creep advantage in a lane. The aura should be turned off if you do not want the lane to get pushed.
In the early game and even into the mid game, the boost of mana regeneration is extremely useful for heroes with low intelligence growth like Troll Warlord.
